enable_dark_mode.name: Enable Dark Mode
enable_dark_mode.hint: Changes the Character, NPC, and Item sheets to a dark theme.

enable_label_shift.name: Enable the Label Shift UI
enable_label_shift.hint: Adds an easy to use label shift UI to the top of the Character Sheet.

MASKS-SHEETS.Label-Shift-Failed: No shift occurs. Instead, you mark a condition.
